item.title: Justin Baldoni's lawsuit against Blake Lively dismissed by federal judge
item.description: Justin Baldoni's lawsuit against Blake Lively was dismissed by a federal judge in New York on Monday.

item.title: Gun deaths among children surge after states loosen firearm laws, new study finds
item.description: Firearms are now the leading cause of death in children and teens in the U.S.
